name: lift me up (just to bury me under)
name_original: lift me up (just to bury me under)
description:
lift me up (just to bury me under) by elliot from seattle

jessica telephone gets shot elsewhere and doesn't return quite the same.

rated t for some violence and swearing. 

title from drunk and with dreams by angel olsen

cover art by @SisterDeathMachine#7715 on discord
